attributes.action: Ban the production and use of ‘one use, none degradable plastic shopping bags’ within the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They are horrifically bad for our environment, each year world wide we produce in excess of 500 billion plastic carrier bags. The use of such carriers are obsolete, we no longer need bags of this nature. It is irresponsible and morally wrong for supermarkets to so carelessly hand out carrier bags in such numbers. Long life carriers should be made available to buy at a low cost as a replacement for one use carrier bags. Biodegradable bags can be used when required in areas where reusable bags would not be suitable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
